channel.title: Creativity on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Creativity on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: day #94
item.description: coming out from under a dark cloud. my passion has been tested & refined during the past few months, and i’m happy to say that i’m starting to see it again. and this time, it’s version 2.0! i’ve come to recognize that my core values & strengths were not aligned with my behavior. my energy was being diffused by activities & investments that were incongruent. so i’ve taken some time to reacquaint myself with my “core”,

item.title: day #4: update
item.description: bob has climbed aboard my attempt to mix it up, and we went on our own adventure tonight. in the 4+ years we’ve been together, i’m not sure we’ve ever “gone out for a drink”. tonight, we took a break from our schedules, claimed a happy hour, & descended on sidebar. we sat on a couch in a dimly lit upstairs bar with no more than 10 other people, an old kung-fu movie playing on various flat-screens around us.
